text: An application for a military-overseas ballot is timely if received by the 7th day before the election. An application for a military-overseas ballot for a primary election, whether or not timely, is effective as an application for a military-overseas ballot for the general election.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 8 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 1-1061.08

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Accommodations for Military and Overseas Voters.

heading.catch_text: Timeliness and scope of application for military-overseas ballot.
